resources.string:
Author: Boyang
 Click one of the OK options to start
 Garage:
 Click OPEN button to open the garage door. This will also light the garage light.
 Click CLOSE button to close the garage door. This will also turn off the garage light.
 Click on the garage lamp to activate the garage light
 Temperature of the house:
 Click the text box and write a value for the temperature, and then click CHANGE TEMPERATURE.
 Click the ADD button to add and remove the schedules you are making.
 Weather:
 Click on the Outdoor Weather Menu to view the weather outside.
 Thank you for using my program!
